_category.title: Basic Queries
_category.description: SELECT, WHERE, ORDER BY, LIMIT fundamentals

basic-2.title: WHERE clause filtering
basic-2.sql:
SELECT product_name, unit_price
FROM products
WHERE unit_price > 20
ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
basic-2.description: Filter products by price with sorting

basic-3.title: Column aliases
basic-3.sql:
SELECT
  product_name AS name,
  unit_price AS price,
  unit_price * 1.2 AS price_with_tax
FROM products
LIMIT 10;
basic-3.description: Use aliases for columns and calculated fields
